title: James x Ellie
enhanced_notes:
### Team Growth & Current Workload

- OBB Media momentum building with key hires in place
  - Kush (Creative Director) started - major stress relief for James
  - Aaron hired from Adam & Eve - significant workload reduction
  - EA offer extended - will handle admin/scheduling
- Recent wins: Super Bowl shoot for Fanatics in LA, upcoming Cash App and Champion shoots
- Next hiring wave planned - looking for 2-3 additional team members
- Current team size: 6 people total

### Strategy Role Requirements & Barney Discussion

- Immediate need shifted to Communications Strategy Director level
  - More campaign/comms focused vs. pure brand strategy
  - Salary range: £180k-£220k (ideally mid-to-low end)
  - Timeline pressure due to client demands
- Barney situation complex but promising
  - James considering her for Head of Strategy role (brand/business strategy focus)
  - She’s become more eager and flexible since initial conversations
  - Pregnancy timing creates business challenges for 6-person team
  - Potential solution: bring in junior comm strategist now, Barney post-maternity
  - Next step: arrange lunch/coffee with Barney and Kush before year-end

### Recruitment Timeline & Challenges

- Holiday season creating response delays (Thanksgiving week impact)
- Multiple candidates lined up for next week interviews
  - Taylor (ex-Droga, Virtue comms strategy background)
  - David and Tara (follow-up calls scheduled)
- Strategy shift: more casual “end of year planning” approach vs. direct job pitch
- James availability: Tuesday-Thursday next week (Wednesday 9-10am or 11am preferred)

### Next Steps

- James: Review updated candidate spreadsheet and add availability
- Ellie: Continue building pipeline of comm strategy directors
- James: Follow up with Barney about informal meet with Kush
- Ellie: Schedule interviews for Tuesday-Thursday next week

---
